p: Figure 5 illustrates SEM images of Cu-Nps obtained in water (a) and in formamide mixture (b). The telmisartan-mediated Cu-Nps in the formamide mixture shows cubic in nature with size in the range of 1 μm (c). Figure 6 illustrates the EDX of Cu-Nps that exhibited the elements (Cu, C, and O) in the nanoparticle, thereby confirming the formation of the nanoparticle. Table 2 shows the EDX analysis of percentage of elements present in the Cu-Np catalyst.
